Linux-motif

exception:

4 org.eclipse.ui 0 java.lang.NullPointerException

The method in JavaProblemHover reads:
public String getHoverInfo(ITextViewer textViewer, IRegion hoverRegion) {
 List problemPositions= fCompilationUnitEditor.getProblemPositions();

CompilationUnitEditor.getProblemPositions() reads:
public List getProblemPositions() {
 if (fProblemPainter != null)
  return fProblemPainter.getProblemPositions();
 return null;
}

When I get the NPE, the fProblemPainter is null, so fCompilationUnitEditor
returns null to getProblemPositions()
